item.title: Publications
item.description: Publications “Impact of turbulence on the coherent flame dynamics in a bluff-body stabilized flame”, A Karmarkar, A Tyagi, S Hemchandra, J O’Connor, Proceedings of the Combustion Institute, 2020. Link “Towards a method of estimating out-of-plane effects on measurements of turbulent flame dynamics”, A Tyagi, J O’Connor, Combustion and Flame, 2020. Link | PDF “Development of a Diagnostic Damkohler Number for Interpreting Laser-Induced Fluorescence Data in Turbulent Flames”, K Beseler, A Tyagi, J O’Connor, AIAA Scitech 2020 Forum, 2020.

item.title: Coolstuff
item.description: Cool Stuff This is where some of the cool stuff I am working on will be posted.

item.title: About
item.description: A Mechanical Engineer by training, I hold a Ph.D. focused on Experimental Combustion research. I currently work at Eriez Manufacturing as an R&D Digital Signal Processing Engineer and have experience working as a Process Engineer at Intel Corporation. Through the academic and industry roles that I have navigated so far, I have developed a strong skill set in experimental research, metrology, and advanced data analysis methods. My recent interests include: • Digital image and signal processing methods • Statistical data analysis, probabilistic modeling, computational problem solving • Laser diagnostics, metrology, imaging techniques • The art of espresso
